content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.

Hello,

We’ve received your message and understand that you’re approaching this situation seriously.
It looks like you’ve put effort into what you’ve done and expect this to be treated accordingly.
In order for us to understand the situation and evaluate our options, we’ll need more information.
Could you please explain what exactly you expect from us? What do you see as the next step?
We’d like to avoid unnecessary misunderstandings and are looking for a way to address this constructively.

Looking forward to your reply.
You pay money, after which we will restore all your systems and delete the information stolen from you.

We understand that you're offering to restore access and delete the stolen data after payment.
Can you help us understand how this process works from your side? What exactly was taken?
It seems like you’ve done this before and know how important trust is in a situation like this.
We’re trying to fully understand the scope of the incident and your expectations so we can decide how to proceed.
Looking forward to your clarification.
If you refuse to pay the ransom, we will make the data from this list publicly available and you will not be able to restore your systems. To restore your systems and remove this data, please pay.

We’ve reviewed the data you shared, and from our perspective, it seems to be mostly general in nature, nothing extremely sensitive or business critical.
That said, we understand this is a serious matter for you, and we know there’s always concern on your side that we might not pay. But the truth is, we still don’t even know what the payment would be.
Can you please clarify the amount you’re asking for, and what exactly the payment would cover?
We’re trying to understand everything clearly so we can make an informed decision.
time for publication and delete decryptor?

Thank you for sharing the details.

We understand that you expect to be compensated for your efforts, and we respect the work you’ve done.
However, the amount you’re asking for is extremely difficult for us to manage, especially under the current circumstances.
Is there any way we could work together to find a figure that would be more realistic for us, while still respecting the effort you’ve made?
We are trying to find a solution that minimizes losses on both sides.
We named the optimal amount in this case. We are trying for you, asking you for a real amount to pay. I can pass your suggestions to my boss, maybe he will give you a small discount.
